text: Next is the fifth studio album by American singer and actress Vanessa Williams. It was released on August 26, 1997, by Mercury Records. ==Track listing== ===Sample credits=== * "Happiness" contains an interpolation of "I Can't Wait" by Nu Shooz. ==Charts== Chart performance for Next Chart (1997) Peak position Japanese Albums (Oricon) 31 ==Certifications== ==Notes== ==References== Category:1997 albums Category:Vanessa Williams albums Category:Pop albums Category:Hip hop soul albums Category:R&B; albums
title: Next (Vanessa Williams album)
